Key Match Events: Tyrese Maxey scored the go-ahead basket with 23.7 seconds left and finished with 29 points to lead Philadelphia to a win over Washington.
Guerschon Yabusele scored 21 points and blocked a potential tying layup with 14 seconds left to preserve the win for the Sixers.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Joel Embiid, Paul George, Kyle Lowry and Andre Drummond all sat out for Philadelphia while Washington played without leading scorer Jordan Poole and Malcolm Brogdon.
Others: The game had a pre-season vibe at the Wells Fargo Center until the Wizards made a serious run in the fourth.
The 76ers snapped a win streak, but the article does not specify how many games they were on a losing streak.
